pullRequest.title: Add batches concept as part of new sync strategy
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Provides the concept of a Batch which is a block range that can be requested from a peer as part of syncing.  The range can be confirmed when it forms a chain with previous or later batches or contested if it doesn't fit into the expected chain.
The BatchDataRequester class manages the chain of batches, requesting additional blocks for them and creating new batches as needed to maintain a pipeline of blocks ready to import.
Also changes Sync to return a result for the sync when it completes instead of SafeFuture<Void>.
Fixed Issue(s)
#1844
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.

commit.message: Start of finalized sync.

Implement more tests, deal with more cases.
Only import one batch at a time.
Extract NavigableSet logic to BatchChain.

Handle changing which chain we sync to.
Add missing dependency.
Implement BatchImporter.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into finalized-sync
Implement the happy path for a real batch implementation.
Report exceptions.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into finalized-sync
Errorprone.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into finalized-sync
Reduce batch size.
Limit the number of non-empty batches in progress at any time, not just the number of requests for more blocks.

Fix last slot calculations.
Handle disconnected peers and errors when requesting blocks.
Very basic support for handling contested blocks.
More debug level output.

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into finalized-sync
Return sync result.
Mark future complete when there are no more batches to process.
Fix SyncSourceBatchTest.
Split requesting of batches into a separate class.
Apply event thread checks to batches in production code too.
Implement markInvalid.

Introduce ConflictResolutionStrategy with a single pessimistic strategy that marks every contested batch as invalid and re-downloads.
Fix issue where incomplete batches were marked as contested because they appeared empty.
Fix assertions.
Log when multipeer sync is in use.
Handle errors raised when requesting blocks because the response is internally inconsistent.
Verify blocks received from separate requests within the same batch form a chain.

Fail sync when there are no peers left on the target chain.
Handle not having any peers when attempting to make requests.
Spotless.
Add batches
Add batch data requester and tests.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into batches
